references.raw: The Authors Henry Rothstein is an ESRC Research Fellow at the ESRC Centre for Analysis of Risk and Regulation, at the LSE. Recent publications include The Government of Risk (Oxford University Press, 2001) with Christopher Hood and Robert Baldwin, and numerous articles on risk and regulation in journals including Public Administration, Law and Policy and Administration and Society.
